text: Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir maba men gɨn ghua sɨghabagh ivi. Men ziabar kara: Asaria, Esra, Mesulam, Juda, Benjamin, Semaia, ko Jeremaia. Ezɨ Jonatanɨn otarim Sekaraia men gɨn zui. (Ezɨ Jonatan a Semaian otarim, ezɨ Semaia a Matanian otarim, ezɨ Matania a Mikaian otarim, ezɨ Mikaia a Sakurɨn otarim, ezɨ Sakur a Asapɨn otarim.)
